testsuite.name: Positive tests / Upload file tests / File upload test

testcase.name: Check response time is less than 3000ms
Check response status code is 200
Check upload file status message to be 'OK'
Check 'Strict-Transport-Security' response header value is 'max-age=31536000; includeSubDomains; preload'
Check response has key 'name' with value equal to uploaded file name

Check response keys are present
Check response 'is_downloadable' value
Validate response json schema
